title: Check Date Period
description: This function determines whether a specified date (dx) falls within a given period defined by two other dates (d1 and d2). It takes into consideration the nuances of leap years and the transition across a new year.
name: PERIOD

input.name: d1
input.description: The start date of the period.

input.name: dx
input.description: The date to check if it falls within the period.

input.name: d2
input.description: The end date of the period.

output.name: PERIOD
output.description: A boolean value indicating if the date dx is within the period defined by d1 and d2.

return_value.description: The result of whether dx is within the period between d1 and d2.
